html:
Tabs was a natural born optimist. He always saw the up side to everything, sought out the silver linings and took advantage of every opportunity to spread hope and joy.

That might be why he liked holidays so much ‚Äî because they were an opportunity to play Santa ‚ÄúClaws,‚Äù so to speak, and spread good tidings to everyone.

Perhaps for the obvious reasons, St. Patrick‚Äôs Day was a fave. Obviously, with those gorgeous green eyes, he loved the color scheme. ‚òòÔ∏è

And then, of course, the gold‚Ä¶ He was also a big fan of that. üòä

Rosie has her own reasons for celebrating St. Paddy‚Äôs Day. For starter‚Äôs, alchemy‚Ä¶

In fact, she did her PhD dissertation in turning lead into gold through targeted meows in the ultra-low frequency range, the so-called ‚Äúsmoker‚Äôs meow‚Äù spectrum.

Marnie, however, did not get the memo regarding St. Patrick‚Äôs Day this year.

Or rather, she did get the memo, but she didn‚Äôt read it.

Or, well, she read it‚Ä¶ She just didn‚Äôt understand it at all. üòπ

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen
